Includes a ReasonForVisit command with appropriate details
Documents HistoryOfPresentIllness with key symptoms and duration
Uses Assess command for existing conditions like GERD
Incorporates AdjustPrescription for new reflux treatment
Records ReviewOfSystem findings such as cough characteristics
Documents any new Diagnose if identified during the visit
Uses FollowUp command to schedule or suggest future visits
Ensures Medication command reflects current medications accurately
Incorporates Allergy command if any new allergies are identified
